Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
with open\(''inventory/serializers.py'', ''rb''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Remove the corrupted byte sequence
corrupted = b''\\xc3\\x83\\xc6\\x92\\xc3\\x82\\xc2\\xa2\\xc3\\x83\\xc2\\xa2\\xc3\\xa2\\xe2\\x80\\x9a\\xc2\\xac\\xc3\\x82\\xc2\\xa0\\xc3\\x83\\xe2\\x80\\x9a\\xc3\\x82\\xc2\\x90 ''
content = content.replace\(corrupted, b''''\)

with open\(''inventory/serializers.py'', ''wb''\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)
print\(''Fixed corrupted bytes''\)
")
